title: Subsidy improves efficiency for pos externality

content.question: If the production of a good results in a positive externality, the government might be able to improve economic efficiency in this market by

choices.label: eliminating private production of the good
imposing a tax on private producers
promoting the export of the surplus output
granting a subsidy to private producers

content.answer: granting a subsidy to private producers

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
